info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued September 9 at 4:15PM EDT until September 10 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Upton NY
info.description:
* WHAT...For the first Coastal Flood Statement, up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. For the second Coastal Flood Statement, up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline.
* WHERE...Hudson County.
* WHEN...For the first Coastal Flood Statement, until midnight EDT tonight. For the second Coastal Flood Statement, from Wednesday morning through Wednesday afternoon.
* IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding in the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional minor coastal flooding is possible with subsequent high tides, particularly for the Wednesday morning and Thursday morning cycles.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.

parameter.value: COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT... ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON
